## âš ï¸ IMPORTANT NOTICE

**For sensitive security vulnerabilities, DO NOT create a public issue.**

Instead, please follow our [Security Policy](../../SECURITY.md) and report privately via email to: **security@cardea-project.example.com**

This includes:
- Remote code execution vulnerabilities
- Authentication bypasses
- Data exposure vulnerabilities
- Privilege escalation issues
- Network-based attacks on edge devices
